channel.title: CVE Feed for Scribit -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Scribit -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-47695|2023-11-13T22:59:51.149Z -- scribit -- shortcodes%20finder
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Scribit Shortcodes Finder plugin <= 1.5.3 versions.

item.title: CVE-2023-45772|2023-10-24T12:18:44.978Z -- scribit -- proofreading
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Scribit Proofreading plugin <= 1.0.11 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-34388|2024-06-04T17:41:38.691Z -- scribit -- gdpr%20compliance
item.description: Exposure of Sensitive Information to an Unauthorized Actor vulnerability in Scribit GDPR Compliance.This issue affects GDPR Compliance: from n/a through 1.2.5.

item.title: CVE-2024-21750|2024-02-01T09:40:16.203Z -- scribit -- shortcodes%20finder
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Scribit Shortcodes Finder allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Shortcodes Finder: from n/a through 1.5.5.
